Posts.EditableText:
You need to enable it in the "game" object to have it show up in the others.

- Click on the "game" object in the left pane.
- Click on the "Features" tab that shows up (second from the left, beside Setup)
- Check the second-from-the-bottom checkbox for "Ask/Tell"

Then you can use the feature in your objects.
